Vehicle.Name: Superflare/Modified Flare-S Swoop
Vehicle.Description: [H3]Superflare/Modified Flare-S Swoop[h3] Please see page 65 of the Dangerous Covenants Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: [B]Oversized Weapons[b]: When the pilot rolls [TH][TH] on a [B]Gunnery check[b], the bike's speed immediately drops by one (to a minimum of one) and the pilot must make an immediate [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Piloting (Planetary) check[b] to keep the swoop from careening out of control in a random direction. If the Gunnery check results in a [DE], the swoop immediately loses all power. The pilot must make spend his next action making a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Mechanics check[b] to restart the swoop before it crashes at the end of the following round (or longer at the GM's discretion).
